name: Only One Way (Ben Yazi)
description:
Game for LudumDare46.

You are robot and you need to protect child. Move between 8th levels with portals. Choose your way in the last level.

Controls:

A and D - for moving left and right

mouse cursor - for change direction

space - for jumping

W and S - for use ladders

E - for pick up child from floor

R - for drop child on floor

left shift - for use gravity magnet (when child on floor) or use heating (when child on hands). Needs some energy for using.

Q - Change camera zoom

Map editor

If you know what is love2d. You can download source code https://github.com/benyazi/ludum-dare-46 . And use http://ld-46-editor.benyazi.ru/ for changed levels. Import json map (sample /src/maps/level_1.json), change it, export new json and save to level file.
